thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: London
thread.title_full: London - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Nancyyf
title: London
text:
Excellent location to major sites and access to tube and Charing cross train is 2 min walk. Mark and spencer close by to buy food items . Many restaurants in the area
In room 118 We had one bedroom and it was adequate for our needs. Pull out bed comfortable. Needs better lighting, bathtub difficult to access due to very high sides, kitchenette well stocked and nice to
use to make breakfast,.
